column1: The Drúedain of Beleriand were those Drúedain who followed the ancestors of the Haladin from the White Mountains to the West and reached Beleriand. There they lived and fought as allies of the Edain during the First Age. Some
column3: lived in the region of the Forest of Brethil.

column2: those who survived the War of Wrath removed to Elenna.
